page.title: 17Clipstone Children's Leisure
page.content: This is a description of some of the many outside leisure activities of a class of 9&10 yr olds in the summer holidays. {Clubs}1.Clipstone Comets Marching Band,2.Guitar,3.Nursing Cadets, 4.Scouts,5.Horse riding,6.Youth Club 7.Ambulance Cadets,8.Football Training 9.Diabetic Club at Kingsmill Hosp. 10.Self-Defence at Mansfield Leisure Centre,11.Fishing Club at Vicar's Pond {Games}Curby;2 ball;Tiggy;Tin Can Alley Tiggy Hospital;Army;Hot Rice;Rounders Tennis;Football;Cricket;Cops & Robbers Leapfrog;Hopscotch;British Bulldogs; Captains Coming;Stick int'Mud; Skipping;Sevensy;Steps;Join the Crew {Other Activities}Playing at:Intake Wood,BMX track,bikes,searching for golfballs on links,the allotments, digging for bottles on the allotments taking the dog for a walk.
